name: Calm and convulsion
description:
"I am then calm... perfect master of myself. But with the very few beings who interest me.... There it is the absurd question: I am a convulsion". (Alejandra Pizarnik)
 
The piece is based on very personal experiences about growth, freedom, identity, contradictions. Internally I create a lot of chaos and it was externalised for the first time when I decided to accept myself as I am, free and natural. I believe that in order to be at ease with oneself it is necessary to have a bit of chaos and convulsion, that's what I call feeling.
